definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
meet by chance/have a chance encounter
happen unexpectedly/turn out contrary to one's expectations

sentences.english: Surprise, consciousness, and pleasure appeared in each of the three on this unexpected meeting;
sentences.chinese: 這次不期而遇使得三人個個又驚又喜，又覺尷尬。

sentences.english: About halfway through your hike, you'll come across a picturesque waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 行至中途，你會不期遇到一個風景如畫的瀑布。

sentences.english: His hand and shoulder were twitching from the unlooked-for contact.
sentences.chinese: 由於這不期而遇的相逢，他的手和肩部在抽搐。

sentences.english: On a gery cemented wall grows, unexpectedly, a patch of green.
sentences.chinese: 灰黑的水泥牆上，不期然露出一抹新綠。

sentences.english: Are they sensitive to the slightest whisper of something that comes unexpectedly?
sentences.chinese: 它們對不期而來的極其低微的細語都很敏感嗎？

sentences.english: Not a false reputation, sarcasm disappear, do more practical work, honor.
sentences.chinese: 不圖虛名，譏諷隨之消失，多幹實事，榮譽不期而至。

sentences.english: Iguess I don't have to call you , now that I ran into you .
sentences.chinese: 既然我們不期而遇了，我想就沒必要給你打電話了。

sentences.english: Unbidden shall it call in the night, that men may wake and gaze upon themselves.
sentences.chinese: 不期然地它要在夜中呼喚，使人們醒起，反躬自省。

sentences.english: The first-time snake buyer is most likely to encounter these snakes.
sentences.chinese: 玩蛇新手最有可能與這些蛇不期而遇。

sentences.english: Strange thoughts arise unsummoned, and the mystery of all things strives for utterance.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的念頭不期而來，萬物都想說出自己的祕密。

sentences.english: Sometimes when you least expect it…Love happens.
sentences.chinese: 有時候戀愛在你最不虞的時辰不期所致。

sentences.english: If you can meet with triumph and disaster and treat those too imposters just the same.
sentences.chinese: 下附口你與成功和失敗不期而遇，把二者皆視爲騙子。

sentences.english: Friends for life, not only offer the sincere return.
sentences.chinese: 一生的朋友，不期回報，只獻真誠。

sentences.english: Oneafternoon while we were there at that lake a thunderstorm came up.
sentences.chinese: 有天下午，我們在湖邊與一場雷雨不期而遇。
人潮擁擠再也不會不期而遇。

sentences.english: The cut out pattern is reminiscent of the ornamental fine jewellery technique, filigree.
sentences.chinese: 開空設計讓人不期然想起用於精品首飾的精緻手工。

definition: to chance upon/to coincide fortuitously with sth
to meet in passing/to get on well at first meeting
to be unable (to do sth)/no reason to .../without rhyme or reason
to hear suddenly/to learn of sth unexpectedly
a close friend over many years
